SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.logic.controls

Class Controls

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.logic.controls.Controls
public class Controls extends Object
Manages input controls and event handlers. Provides functionality to register and unregister event callbacks.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Controls(long windowHandle)
    Creates a new controls manager for the specified window

    • Controls

      public Controls(long windowHandle)
      Creates a new controls manager for the specified window
      Parameters:
      windowHandle - The GLFW window handle to capture events from

  • Method Details

    • register

      public <E extends BaseEvent> E register(Selector selector, Function callback) throws Throwable
      Registers a new event handler for the specified control type
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of event to register
      Parameters:
      selector - The selector for the control type to register
      callback - The function to call when the event occurs
      Returns:
      The created event handler instance
      Throws:
      Throwable - if event registration fails
      See Also:
      • BaseEvent

    • unRegister

      public void unRegister(ControlTypes controlType)
      Unregisters a specific control type event handler from all elements
      Parameters:
      controlType - The control type to unregister from all elements

    • UnRegister

      public void UnRegister(BaseElement<?> element)
      Unregisters all event handlers associated with a specific element
      Parameters:
      element - The element to unregister events from

    • unRegisterAll

      public void unRegisterAll()
      Unregisters all registered event handlers
